headline: WM Announces Cash Dividend
summary: HOUSTON, November 13, 2025--WM (NYSE: WM) today announced the declaration of a quarterly cash dividend of $0.825 per share payable December 19, 2025, to stockholders of record on December 5, 2025.

headline: How Investors Are Reacting To WM’s Analyst Upgrade Following Missed Earnings and Institutional Buying
summary: Earlier this week, Baird upgraded Waste Management to Outperform despite the company recently missing third-quarter revenue and earnings targets due to weaker recycled commodity pricing and lower revenue from its healthcare segment. Institutional investor activity has picked up, with over 1,000 investors increasing holdings and analyst sentiment remaining positive despite operational challenges. We'll explore how Baird's upgrade, reflecting confidence in Waste Management's core strengths,...

headline: Here's 1 Top Dividend Stock to Buy and Hold Forever
summary: Garbage isn't the most glamorous industry, but it can generate impressive long-term returns.
